91437.「ヒコボシ様！ お待たせいたしました。 \n 平身低頭の儀の準備が ととのいまし:
Dear Mr. Hikoboshi! Thank you for waiting. The preparations for the prostration ceremony are complete. I am sure that this will clear
Orihime-sama's mind.

91438.「おお ありがとうございます。\n それでは 今すぐにでも 儀式を始めましょう！:
Oh, thank you. Now then, let us begin the
ritual right now!

91439.「我が最愛の乙女…… オリヒメよ。 \n 私は とても反省しています。\n それ:
My dearest maiden, Orihime. I am so sorry. It
is deeper than the night, more single-minded
than the stars...

91440.「その証として おおいなる愛情と誠意をもって \n 平身低頭の儀の祭具を そろえ:
As proof of this, with great affection and sincerity, we have prepared the ritual equipment for the bowing down ceremony, and
will perform it herewith.

91441.「我が祈りの心 天に届かば\n どうか 心にかかった雲を払い\n 今ひとたび そ:
If my heart of prayer reaches the heavens,
please dispel the clouds that hang over my
heart and reveal yourself to me once again.

91443.<center>……もう しょうがないなあ。\nヒコリンの気持ちは よ～く わか:
I can't help it. I understand how HIKORIN
feels!

91444.「……ああっ 本当に よかった！\n このまま 顔を見せてくれなかったら\n ど:
Oh, I'm so glad! I was afraid what I would do
if you didn't show your face to me, Ori Wori.

91445.「ヒコリンの謝罪の気持ちは\n じゅーぶんに 伝わったからね！\n でも もう:
Hikoline's apology was conveyed to me in
spades! But I'm not going to let that happen
again!

91446.「ええ ええ。もう二度としないと 誓います。 \n 悲しませて すみません。私は:
Yeah, yeah. I swear it won't happen again. I'm
sorry to make you sad. I always want Ori Wori
to smile.

91450.「……それにしても これほど仲のよい\n ヒコボシ様とオリヒメ様が ケンカなさる:
But what in the world could have caused
Hikoboshi and Orihime, who are such good
friends, to fight?

91451.「いやあ それは…… \n なんとも お恥ずかしい話なのですが……。:
Well, that's... well, I'm quite embarrassed to
say this, but...

91452.「オリリンへの手紙に \n 世界で１番 愛していますと 書いたところ……:
I just wrote a letter to Ori Wori saying that
I love her more than anything in the world...

91453.「宇宙で１番じゃないなんて\n 私への愛が足りない証拠だと\n オリリンに 言わ:
Orrin told me that I'm not the best in the
universe, which proves that he doesn't love me
enough...

91454.「…………はあ。\n そんなことだったんですか……。: ...Huh. So that's what that was about...

91455.「全然 そんなことなんかじゃないよ～！ \n だって 私は ヒコリンのこと\n:
That's not at all what I meant! Because I love
Hikorin more than anyone else in the universe.

91456.「私も オリリンのことを \n 宇宙で１番 愛していますよ……。:
I love Ori Wori more than anything in the
universe...

91458.「それはそうと オリヒメ。こうしてまた今年も\n 私たちがめぐり会えたのは そち:
Well, by the way, Orihime. It is thanks to
<pc> over there that we were able to
meet again this year.

91459.「それはそうと オリヒメ。こうしてまた今年も\n 私たちがめぐり会えたのは そち:
Well, by the way, Orihime. It is thanks to the
<pc> over there that we were able to
meet again this year.

91462.「そうだったのですね……。\n 私たちの仲を取りもってくださり ありがとう。\n:
I see... thank you for bringing us together.
Let me pray for you, at least.

91463.「心優しき あなたのもとに\n いつか ステキなご縁が 訪れますよう\n 縁結び:
As the god of marriage, let me bestow my
blessing on you so that someday a wonderful
match will come to you with a kind heart...

91464.「そして 星が 何度巡ろうとも\n その縁が 変わりなく続きますように……。:
And may the stars turn again and again, and
may the bond between us continue unbroken...

91465.「心優しき あなたたちの仲が\n これからも よりいっそう深まるように\n 縁結:
As the god of marriage, I bestow my blessing
on you so that you may grow even closer
together...

91466.「そして 星が 何度巡ろうとも\n すばらしい恋路を たどるように\n あなたた:
And let the stars guide your destiny to follow
the path of great love, no matter how many
times they turn...

91467.「……それから これは 私から\n 儀式を 手伝ってくれたお礼です。:
...and this is my way of thanking you for
helping me with the ritual.

91468.「それでは 私たちは ここで\n 今年の限られた時間を 共に過ごし\n よりいっ:
So here we are, spending our limited time this
year together, nurturing our love even more.

91469.「どうか あなたも\n 最後まで 七夕を楽しんでいってくださいね。:
Please enjoy the Tanabata Festival until the
end.
